title: Kangarilla crash: Four people injured in head-on smash
text:
Two cars have collided head-on in a serious smash south of Adelaide.

The crash happened at the intersection Quigley and Sand roads, Kangarilla, about 8.50pm on Wednesday.

The driver of a sedan involved in the smash has been flown to the Flinders Medical centre in a critical condition, while two passengers were also taken to hospital.

Meantime, the driver of a utility was treated at the scene for minor injuries.

Major Crash officers inspected the scene overnight.

The road was closed for several hours, but it has since been reopened.

Anyone who may have witnessed the crash is asked to call Crime Stoppers on 1800 333 000, or online.
